definition: tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
lit. you hit the high road, I'll cross the log bridge (idiom)/fig. you go your way, I'll go mine/you do it your way, I'll do it mine
pinyin: ni3 zou3 ni3 de5 Yang2 guan1 Dao4 , wo3 guo4 wo3 de5 du2 mu4 qiao2
containing_words.word: 你走你的陽關道，我過我的獨木橋

sentences.english: You take the open road and I'll cross the log bridge.
sentences.chinese: 你走你的陽光道，我過我的獨木橋。

sentences.english: What's the meaning of passing the university entrance exam?
sentences.chinese: 走過“高考”這座獨木橋意義何在？

sentences.english: Only firm confidence and untiring efforts is the difficult path leading to victory.
sentences.chinese: 唯有堅定的信心與不懈的努力纔是通往勝利的獨木橋。

sentences.english: When Baby pig sees his mother in the single-log bridge, he waves his hands happily.
sentences.chinese: 當豬寶寶看到他的媽媽在獨木橋上，他高興地揮手。

sentences.english: The students filed across a narrow foot bridge.
sentences.chinese: 學生們逐一走過獨木橋。

sentences.english: Congress has opted for the low road of misdirected currency bashing.
sentences.chinese: 國會已經選擇了一條打擊貨幣的獨木橋路線。

sentences.english: He was afraid to cross the one-logged bridge because he was afraid of falling into the river.
sentences.chinese: 他不敢過這座獨木橋，因爲他害怕掉進河裏。

sentences.english: She teetered over the single-log bridge.
sentences.chinese: 她搖搖晃晃地走過獨木橋。

sentences.english: One day, he throws the husk to the single-log bridge.
sentences.chinese: 一天，他把西瓜皮扔到了獨木橋上。

definition: mountain and river exhausted (idiom); at the end of the line/nowhere to go
to force someone to do something
to stake all on one throw
to repeat errors/to continue blundering/to make continuous mistakes
the road back to where one came from
